messages.subject: Re: Adult time - addendum
messages.msgSnippet: ... I forgot to add: I worry much more about what other people might do to my children than what my children might do to themselves. I will not let other
messages.messageBody:
>> You're saying that if your children were doing something that could harm
>> them, you wouldn't step in and restrict them from doing whatever it is? I
>> assumed all parents would


I forgot to add: I worry much more about what other people might do to my
children than what my children might do to themselves. I will not let other
people dictate to them, shame them, regulate them (that includes me and
their father). I will fight fiercely for the safety and happiness, including
if I am the cause of their unhappiness. I am vigilant about their life,
liberty and pursuit of happiness.

Pam
